name: Slash command auto-complete works as expected in RHS thread
precondition: Note: Requires test demo plugin build here: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-demo/tree/MM-20684-Plugin-Autocomplete-Implementation

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Install Agenda v0.3.0
  2. Make a post and open the reply thread for it
  3. Type /agenda queue and select any day of the week
  4. Type an agenda item
  5. Send the command
  6. Type /todo and select list form the options list
inline.expectedResult: • Slash command auto-complete options are visible in RHS

customFields.Related ticket(s): RHS Autocomplete options cover the input box for some reply threads â€” MM-32684
